name: Slime Defender
description:
This is intended as a single player game, but can be played as local co-op multiplayer.

Explanation:

  • Prevent the heroes from reaching your slime pots. Do this by simply getting in their way. If a pot breaks, you lose.
  • To defeat a hero, your slime must have absorbed slime greater or equal to the number displayed by their head.
  • To merge slimes, simply move them together.
  • To split a slime, hold opposing directional keys (e.g. for WASD, hold either WS or AD).
